meanings.sent1: The cheetah outsped the lion in the race.
meanings.sent2: The hare outsped the tortoise in the sprint.
meanings.sent3: The sports car outsped the old truck on the highway.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outsped any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The wind outsped the runner, carrying fallen leaves with it.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit outsped the turtle yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She outsped her previous record in the race.
meanings.sent3: The snail outsped the sloth in the slow-motion race.
meanings.sent4: His idea outsped all others in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The river outsped its banks during the heavy rain.
